comment_body:
Hey /u/riverfollower712, thanks for contributing to /r/shortscarystories. Unfortunately, your post was removed as it violates our rules:

Posts must be 500 words or less, and have a minimum of three sentences.

Please read the sidebar before posting again. If you have questions or concerns, please [message the moderators through modmail](https://www.reddit.com/message/compose?to=/r/shortscarystories&subject=&message=). Thank you!

I think the main character has amnesia and is trying to recall their memories, but they must have killed a family of four in I think a car crash, or they just killed a family of four and they want to believe it was an accident
